title: Concept Mapping-Based Technical Problem Diagnosis and Resolution Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Case studies modeling real industrial technical problems, supported by a self-directed learning environment through digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can represent complex technical problems as structured concept maps with 80% accuracy within three months.
Learners can achieve at least 70% similarity to expert-level diagnostic procedures when analyzing real-world cases.
Learners iteratively improve concept maps at least three times by incorporating peer feedback in PBL environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
